resources.string: Allows this package to add or override commands in the Google Search app

This module adds an API to the Google Search app, commonly referred to as Google Now.\n\nWith this, you can install modules made by developers that extend Google Search\'s functionality. For more modules, visit the support thread from the action bar.
"You may access this app again by tapping the module in Xposed Installer, or by searching/saying \"Show Google Now API intro\" in the Google Search API."
Google Search API allows developers to hook onto Google\'s Search app and provide their own functionality.\n\nAPI © 2013 Mohammad Abu-Garbeyyeh
